name: Based Department
description: Based Department is a memecoin on the Solana blockchain, launched on Pump Fun, designed purely for the culture and memes. With no lofty promises or complex roadmaps, the project focuses on bringing people together through humor and shared internet culture. Inspired by the popular "Hello, based department?" meme featuring iconic frog characters, it embraces the spirit of being “based” and engaging in lighthearted, fun interactions. Based Department thrives on community energy and aims to foster a loyal following centered around good vibes and meme-driven creativity. For more context on the meme: https://knowyourmeme.com/memes/based-department
